Maxgold Real Estate

Find out with us your desirable Luxury apartments and offices for rent or buy.

Get Started

MaxGold is the world's Leading Luxury Real Estate.

We have a global network offering exclusive apartments and luxury real estate services to our clients.

Launched in November 2007, MaxGold is a company dedicated to those who wish to rent or buy a luxury apartment or office, along with those who are passionate about prestigious real estate and curious to discover new trends and interior solutions.

At times real estate can be a part of our history, at times inspirations from new architectural concepts, or at other times simply amazing examples of how you can transform a space with the right interior design choices.

The world is huge, with many languages, and each country has their own diverse culture. Nevertheless, scanning through our listings you will discover two corresponding elements: the importance of what we call luxury and the idea of beauty.

Find a new luxury property for rent or purchase has never been an easy feat. But we made it simple for you.

Look more

Max Gold provides service to the clients in the most big cities around the world.

We explore every corner in search of the best. You can rely on top quality services when you become our customers.

Apartments

We have created a unique combination of luxurious, spacious, fully furnished apartments with 24-hour service and a range of facilities such as spa, breakfast delivered to the apartment, luxury transport services.

Bright, stylish and modern apartments are ideal for traveling couples, families with children, groups of friends and members of the business world.

We offer a high standard apartments in the most desirable and beautiful places of your city.

MaxGold understands that the attitude of luxury is all about finding the best things for you. And for us, it starts with a focus on making your time feel unforgettable.

Offices

MaxGold is pleased to present a luxurious offices.

These unique offices has been decorated to a very high standard in order to meet the requirements of the most demanding tenants. The property is located in the building's office area with a separate, representative reception and a designated place for the company's logo.

The MaxGold offices are one of the most luxurious and prestigious choice in the world. It also include underground area with a fitness club, pool, squash court, and a parking level. Finally, allow access to a spa and a wine cellar.

The locations are the heart of cities in the most popular areas.
